name: ProfessorofPerseverance
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
My name is Dr. James Perdue. I was paralyzed from playing football at 19. I persevered to triumph over tragedies. I encourage listeners to accept adversity, begin battling and conquer challenges!

I've been a featured speaker at various universities, conferences and hospitals.

When life hands you lemons make a strawberry pie. By saying “Yes, I Can” while persevering through adversities, it makes conquering challenges so sweet. Don’t survive in a valley when you can thrive on a mountain by learning perseverance and maintaining a positive attitude when destroying difficulties from Life University.

Enable my flash briefing for inspiration in hard circumstances.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
